options.description: Configuration options for collecting and rendering objects.
options.markdownDescription:
[DOCUMENTATION](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/shell/usage/#options)

Configuration options for collecting and rendering objects.
options.title: options

heading.description: A custom string to override the autogenerated heading of the root object.
heading.markdownDescription:
[DOCUMENTATION](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/shell/usage/configuration/headings/#heading)

A custom string to override the autogenerated heading of the root object.
heading.title: heading

heading_level.description: The initial heading level to use.
heading_level.markdownDescription:
[DOCUMENTATION](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/shell/usage/configuration/headings/#heading_level)

The initial heading level to use.
heading_level.title: heading_level

show_symbol_type_heading.description: Show the symbol type in headings (e.g. mod, class, meth, func and attr).
show_symbol_type_heading.markdownDescription:
[DOCUMENTATION](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/shell/usage/configuration/headings/#show_symbol_type_heading)

Show the symbol type in headings (e.g. mod, class, meth, func and attr).
show_symbol_type_heading.title: show_symbol_type_heading

show_symbol_type_toc.description: Show the symbol type in the Table of Contents (e.g. mod, class, methd, func and attr).
show_symbol_type_toc.markdownDescription:
[DOCUMENTATION](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/shell/usage/configuration/headings/#show_symbol_type_toc)

Show the symbol type in the Table of Contents (e.g. mod, class, methd, func and attr).
show_symbol_type_toc.title: show_symbol_type_toc

toc_label.description: A custom string to override the autogenerated toc label of the root object.
toc_label.markdownDescription:
[DOCUMENTATION](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/shell/usage/configuration/headings/#toc_label)

A custom string to override the autogenerated toc label of the root object.
toc_label.title: toc_label
